> [{quoted}](name=The Wolf King,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=jN5AieFj,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2018-02-09T03:11:36.103+0000)

> 
> I want you to and look up the definition of balance

Adc winrates are only relevant compared to other adcs.

Meanwhile Zoe gets gutted for being at a flat 50 and ornn gets smacked with the bat for being at a massive 48.

This nerf was a direct hit though; Kog's most powerful ability nerfed, so his powerspike was nerfed as well. 

And not necessarily so; the state of other ADCs has a general effect on any given ADC, especially Kog. Weak lane power = weak game power. For example, S2 Twitch had the ability to one shot teams faster than he could dream of even now. But he never got to that point unless the enemy really fucked up, so he was considered trash tier. Other ADCs have the biggest impact on the success of the ADC in question... this is the way balance should be looked at since it is the most practical.
